title: Criterion 1
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately identifies the different eras of Mexican history that are presented in the mural.
descriptions: Accurately identifies the different eras of Mexican history that are presented in the mural.

title: Criterion 2
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately explains the message about Mexican history that Rivera was attempting to convey.
descriptions: Accurately explains the message about Mexican history that Rivera was attempting to convey.

title: Criterion 3
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately explains how original viewers responded to the mural.
descriptions: Accurately explains how original viewers responded to the mural.

title: Criterion 4
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately uses specific visual evidence to explain why the original viewers responded to the mural in that way.
descriptions: Accurately uses specific visual evidence to explain why the original viewers responded to the mural in that way.

title: Criterion 5
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately uses specific contextual evidence to explain why the original viewers responded to the mural in that way.
descriptions: Accurately uses specific contextual evidence to explain why the original viewers responded to the mural in that way.
